virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart1
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Jungfraujoch deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, TEMPERATURE from Jungfraujoch_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, TEMPERATURE, null) as 1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, TEMPERATURE, null) as 2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, TEMPERATURE, null) as 3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, TEMPERATURE, null) as 4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, TEMPERATURE, null) as 5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, TEMPERATURE, null) as 6, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 7, TEMPERATURE, null) as 7, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 8, TEMPERATURE, null) as 8, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 9, TEMPERATURE, null) as 9, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 10, TEMPERATURE, null) as 10, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 11, TEMPERATURE, null) as 11, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 12, TEMPERATURE, null) as 12, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 13, TEMPERATURE, null) as 13, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 14, TEMPERATURE, null) as 14, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 15, TEMPERATURE, null) as 15, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 16, TEMPERATURE, null) as 16 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
